Author: Matthias9515
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Hdac Technology Announces Business Strategy and Technology Roadmap  Hdac to Provide Enterprise Blockchain Solution as a Service as well as an Easy and Convenient Developing Environment, Expecting to Win Businesses within 1H 2019 HYUNDAI PAY to Start Hdac-Coin-Based Prepaid Point Service within the Year to Lead Commercializing Cryptocurrency with Large-scale Investment  Hdac technology company, founded by Hyundai BS&C CEO Dae Sun Chung in October 2017, held a press conference on March 13 at Grand InterContinental Seoul Parnas, to present future business strategy and technology development roadmap.  Hdac Technology is a tech company under blockchain project 'Hdac'. Hdac is a hybrid blockchain platform integrating public and private blockchains and is designed as enterprise architecture to process diverse needs in the industry.  Hdac Technology announced its plan to complete the development of SDK and API in the first quarter to build an enterprise solution developing environment and the framework. Specifically, Hdac will use the DevOps approach to enable fast and easy development, establishment, test, and distribution of Hdac-based blockchain infrastructure.  CTO Moon-Ok Cho said, "We aim to help companies to establish and operate their own blockchain-based services with ease by providing BaaS(Blockchain-as-a-Service) solution. We are currently reviewing cooperation with a world-renowned cloud service provider to provide top quality enterprise blockchain services and to acquire a competitive edge in the global market."  "Hdac Enterprise Blockchain Solution can be applied to various fields including construction, real estate, manufacturing, finance, and retail. We have completed two PoC(Proof-of-Concept) projects so far besides HERIOT, a blockchain-IoT converged smart home solution that we have already launched, and expect to win more than four actual projects during the first half of the year," he explained.  Hdac Technology's FinTech business is driven under the initiative of HYUNDAI PAY, aiming to provide convenient daily cryptocurrency payment services. HYUNDAI PAY is a Korean corporation that has Hdac Technology CEO Michael Yoon and CTO Moon-Ok Cho as the CEO and the CSO respectively.  The core of the FinTech business is Prepaid Point Payment Service. With the service, customers can purchase prepaid e-money called 'H Point'(tentative) with 'Hdac Coin' and use it for transfer, electronic payment at online/offline franchise stores, QR-code payment at retail stores, and utility bill payment on smart home service. CTO Moon-Ok Cho's further plan is to evolve 'H Point' into a stablecoin in the future.  Real Estate P2P Service carefully selects investment-worthy real assets and provides investors with profits. In particular, it aims to provide a blockchain-based P2P platform that links with the Prepaid Point Service, enabling convenient real asset management and reinvestment to various forms of assets. It plans to expand the service into a total P2P Finance Service by broadening the spectrum of assets to cryptocurrency and more.  In regards to the public blockchain sector, the development of Bridge Node that connects Hdac MainNet and a DApp partner's mainnet has been completed. It will be released by the end of March at earliest, after internal integration test and verification. 'Hdac Contract' based on the Bridge Node is designed with a focus on providing a DApp service that can issue tokens and be applied to diverse industrial environments.  CEO Michael Yoon commented that, "Hdac Technology will provide all types of blockchain-related services to better assist customers in the era of the 4th industrial revolution by integrating upcoming technologies like IoT, AI, big data, and FinTech." He also added, "We are in dialogues with a globally renowned blockchain team to upgrade the current ePoW algorithm into a new blockchain protocol which suits the new era.”

Author: Matthias9515
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: PCT International Patent Application    The second largest city in South Korea, Busan and HYUNDAI PAY, affiliated companies of Hdac Technology, signed an MOU on February 12nd for boosting Blockchain industry. Moreover, our own cryptocurrency, Hdac coin, has drawn keen attention in the global cryptocurrency market after being listed on Bithumb, one of the top global exchange.  As we are approaching the time for Hdac to internationally show off the genuine value of its technology, we applied for PCT international patent for ‘Cryptographic Communication Method and System Between Devices Using Blockchain System (PCT-KR2019–002065),’ with which we can protect our patent right in 152 different countries. Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT)  Not like the ordinary ‘1 Country 1 Patent’ rule, which makes the business to get patents in every individual country that is in business territory, Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT) helps business to get patent priority protected internationally; the application of PCT international patent allows Hdac to get this benefit in 152 countries including the U.S. and Europe.    As unnecessary processes for the patent application can be omitted, we can react to global issues promptly and settle into the global market more rapidly.  Hdac Technology to the Global Leader in the Era of 4th Industry Revolution  The ‘Cryptographic Communication Method and System Between Devices Using Blockchain System’ is a technology to help IoT based Hdac platform to be applied in Smart Home. This technology allows us to enjoy a smarter life through the connection between IoT devices. This technology is about cryptographic communication method and system between devices within an authorized group, based on the system’s stability. On the blockchain systems currently, one could only share information that is opened; on the other hand, this technology allows encrypted P2P communication available on a blockchain system. Because the blockchain systems currently are formed in an open network, every connected device can access to information throughout the blockchain; therefore confidentiality between specific devices cannot be secured, and the integrity of transaction cannot be guaranteed when using SSL(Secure Socket Layer). With our new patent-applied technology, these problems are expected to be solved. When applied to a Smart Home environment, a certain family and their home can be set as a blockchain group — and their personal devices like smartphone, the built-in wall pad, and other IoT devices in the home are registered as constituents of the group. Then, the family member can control other IoT devices via blockchain based authentification with superior security, while others not registered to the group cannot control the devices.    Recently, the security and reliability issues of Smart Home system are being raised more often. The Blockchain based Smart Home system of Hdac Technology is expected to be the clear and definite solution.

Author: intotherain
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Is HDAC (Hyundai Coin) Worth Investing?  Greetings everyone!   Today, I would like to introduce you to Hyundai Digital Asset Currency (HDAC), also known as “Hyundai Coin,” which has been quite controversial yet not without great potential. HDAC has been issued by Hdac Technology, located in Zug, Switzerland, and was founded by Dae-Sun Chung,the 3rd generation of the Hyundai dynasty in Korea1. Hyundai BS&C set up Hdac Technology under its provisions, and Hyundai Pay aids in the commercialization of HDAC by developing subsidiary technology and preparing infrastructure as its partnering company.   HDAC aims to solve the security of internet of things (IoT), allow machine to machine (M2M) data transfers and HDAC transactions, and ultimately act as payment currency in the pay industry3. Currently, it is mined via the ePoW algorithm, an analogue of the PoW made more equitable and eco-friendly, uses SkunkHash, and plans to switch to a new hybrid algorithm that uses both ePoW and either PoS and dPoS (date undecided as of now).   The past year, HDAC had been under a lot of fire,but exceptional changes have taken place in October 2018, and HDAC has become a“hot cryptocurrency” in Korea after its listing in GDAC exchange5. The reasons behind why HDAC is garnering more attention and is regarded to have great potential in the future are delineated in the following seven points:   1. First reason. HDAC cryptocurrency has been issued to be 100% commercialized as a utility coin that also intends to be used as a payment coin. It will be put into practical use in Heriot Apartment,located in Samsong, Goyang City in Korea, which is under construction by Hyundai BS&C. Last June, President Dae-Sun Chung of Hyundai BS&C announced that HDAC’s platform will be applied in “front door sensor,electricity, water, gas, and other IoT devices” in Heriot Apartment6. In the same interview, he explained that HDAC will act as a currency by which payment bills can be made, showing that Hdac Technology will also continually produce profit through such business models. For further information, Heriot Apartment is displayed in the official website7 of HDAC and the blueprint of HDAC8.    The following photos from Naver Map show theHeriot Apartment complex under construction:      2. Second reason. Hdac Technology received “NoAction Letter,” the highest level of clearance, from the Financial Market Supervisory Authority (FINMA) of Switzerland on October 22, 201810.Such recognition corresponds to the FDA approval status in the cryptocurrency world, demonstrating that HDAC has credibility and backing authority11. With the approval from FINMA, HDAC stands on top of many other cryptocurrencies, and will especially shine when SEC or other governmental institutions begin to majorly regulate cryptocurrencies. HDAC received thefinal approval after a long due process extending eight long months, and the approval that HDAC, with its own main net, received is clearly superior to those of the ERC20-based tokens based in Switzerland, allowing them to merely begin their projects12. The administrator of Hdac Technology explained as follows:     The following is a photo of the “No Action Letter” that Hdac Technology AG has received from FINMA:    3. Third reason. Hdac has recently announced that it will radically reduce both the block rewards and the total supply13. Such measures will resolve the hyperinflation due to excessive mining rewards,let Hdac stand out even amidst the reduced cryptocurrency market cap, and meet the requests the Hdac community has hitherto been proposing. Hdac’s block rewards will be reduced 90%, from 5,000 per block to 500 per block, and the total supply will be reduced 76.25%, from 12 billion to 2.85 billion14. As a result, the relative value of HDAC has increased 5-10 fold, and its potential to increase in value in the future has also greatly improved.    4. Fourth reason. As much as the founder of Hdac Technology is Dae-Sun Chung, the 3rd generation of the Hyundai dynasty, Hdac has been continually making contact with the big Hyundaic orporations, whose owners are his direct families and relatives. In other words, HDAC has great potential to be adopted by the Hyundai dynasty as their main cryptocurrency. In a recent interview by Michael Yun, the general manager of the Hdac Technology AG Korea Office, he revealed that Hdac has indeed been talking to the big Hyundai corporations regarding partnership in the blockchain realm15. A recent news article stated as follows16:   “Michael Yun, the general manager of Hdac Technology, in his interview with Newsis on November 30, 2018 in the Hdac Technology office located in Jung-gu, Seoul, proclaimed that Hdac Technology had been ‘undergoing PoC with three big Hyundai corporations.’  Yun did not mention the specific names of the Hyundai corporations, but he was confident in that Hdac will show the world an epitome of commercialized blockchain technology in the first quarter of 2019.”  In addition, one of the investors who went toHdac’s meet-up once stated that he heard “Hdac Technology is preparing partnership with Hyundai Heavy Industries, Hyundai Asan Medical Center, and Kumkang Coryo Chemicals (KCC)17.” Furthermore, Hdac’s blueprint also displays “Smart Ship in Hyundai Heavy Industries (HHI)” and “Smart Factory in Mando18.”A related article states, “Hdac is using IoT sensors in enterprise solution systems to tract supplies and resources on the Hdac blockchain and is PoC testings mart factories that utilize blockchain-based electronic contract solution systems that span from contracts and warehousing to settlement of payments and receipt issuance19.”    5. Fifth reason. Hdac Technology has recently scouted a globally renowned star Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) through Korn Ferry20,the world-famed professional recruiting company listed in NYSE. The CMO willsoon be announced21, and the upcoming marketing movements will be noteworthy. Hdac Technology also promised the community that it will implement aggressive marketing strategies22 after the final FINMA approval,and the future looks bright23.    6. Sixth reason. Hdac Technology announced thatit is accelerating its fintech business by promoting payment solutions using HDAC transaction services. According to recent news media, “in order to expand and commercialize its own HDAC blockchain platform, Hdac Technology is targeting the 120 million dollar industry of prepaid point market, and is also focusing on account settlement within smart homes, franchise store point markets, real estate P2P services, and other cryptocurrency-based fintech markets24.”Insofar as HDAC has been recognized by FINMA as a “utility coin that directs toward payment services,” much attention is given to Hdac for its hopeful future in fintech and the payment businesses.  7. Seventh reason. Numerous ICO projects that have underwent crowdfunding with Ethereum (ETH) have been inflicted with devastating losses due to the recent collapse of ETH value, causing their projects to face major financial problems. However, Hdac was the cryptocurrency with the number one highest crowdfund in the year 2017, and it collected Bitcoin (BTC), whose price declined relatively less than the others major cryptocurrencies, and also led to the free acquisition of BCH, BSV, BTG, and BCD via hardforks25. Just in the recent two months, ETCDEV, the major developer of Ethereum Classic (ETC), proclaimed that it cease all its developments and public activities because of lack of funds26; Steemit announced that it will layoff 70% of its employees due to financial crisis27; and Consensys also laid off 13% of its employees because of the financial burden caused by the collapse of ETH price28. An expert in the field exclaimed as follows29:   “Many crypto start-ups expected the crypto market cap to recover by the end of 2018 and did not sell most of their ETH. However, as the market cap hit new lows and the price of ETH did not recover, they are now facing a critical financial crisis… Some even have bought more ETH in the hopes that the price of ETH will recover soon. One manager of an ICO project said, ‘Because of the financial crisis, our project is also considering laying off team members,’ and a personnel of another project appealed, ‘Our project cannot continue and provide promised services unless we receive another massive investment because we sold none of our collected ETH when the price was much higher.’’  As shown by the above report, many cryptocurrency enterprises current face bankruptcy. Start-ups that crowdfunded using ETH especially suffered great losses because the value of ETH ended up less than 1/20th of that in the beginning of this year. If these start-ups run out of their collected ETH, they may have to sell (or dump) the developers’ or the team’s share of their tokens, but since the price of their tokens have also collapsed after hitting exchanges, this may not be an option, and will especially be frowned upon by the investors and hodlers.   Crypto start-ups may have excellent developers, but without funds, projects cannot proceed in this competitive market under the realm of capitalism. Ultimately, those projects with ample funding or financial backing will persist and attract the developers from other projects.In fact, just this month, a member of Ethereum Classic developer team joined Tron30. Therefore, it is critical that investors be more sensitive to the financial state of crypto projects in the current bearish market.   Fortunately, Hdac Technology collected the highest fund in the year 2017 and is backed by Hyundai BS&C and Dae-Sun Chung, the 3rd generation of the Hyundai dynasty. As mentioned earlier, Hdac also raised its funds with BTC, which had less losses and also brought about free BCH, BSV, BTG, and BCD. In the long run, especially in this bearish market, HDAC has a great potential to shine and succeed.   Although a lot of controversies brewed behind Hdac, if one analyzes deeply, he or she will indeed acknowledge that Hdac has great potential and deserves consideration in cryptocurrency investment portfolios. Moreover, HDAC has not been introduced into top exchanges yet, so its value reserves much capacity to increase even in the short term.   So is HDAC worth investing? The final decision rests on you, but with the consideration of the aforementioned seven reasons, HDAC seems much closer to the bullish side than the bearish side.   Merry Christmas and Happy New Years to everyone,and happy HODLing!    Footnotes 1. http://www.newsis.com/view/?id=NISX20180606_0000329017 2. http://hyundai-pay.com/ 3. https://github.com/Hdactech/doc/wiki/Whitepaper 4. http://ccnews.lawissue.co.kr/view.php?ud=201812200920151857204ead0791_12 5. https://support.gdac.com/hc/ko/articles/360013380953-%EC%97%90%EC%9D%B4%EC%B9%98%EB%8B%A5-HDAC-%EC%83%81%EC%9E%A5-%EC%98%88%EC%A0%95 6. http://www.newsis.com/view/?id=NISX20180606_0000329017 7. https://hdactech.com/en/Hdac/hdac.do 8. https://www.hdactech.com/_res/en/etc/Hdac_blueprint.pdf 9. https://www.finma.ch/en/ 10. http://news1.kr/articles/?3487710 11. https://www.ajunews.com/view/20181128162304795 12. https://t.me/Hdac_Official_KR/53975 13. https://medium.com/@hdackorea/%EC%B1%84%EA%B5%B4%EB%B3%B4%EC%83%81%EB%9F%89-%EB%B0%8F-%EC%B4%9D-%EB%B0%9C%ED%96%89%EB%9F%89-%EA%B0%90%EC%B6%95-e3cea35e5087 14. https://hdacvalue.com/customer/notice/detail/70 15. http://www.newsis.com/view/?id=NISX20181205_0000493412 16. Ibid. 17. https://t.me/Hdac_Official_KR/63146 18. https://www.hdactech.com/_res/en/etc/Hdac_blueprint.pdf 19. http://www.etnews.com/20181220000217 20. https://www.kornferry.com/ 21. https://t.me/Hdac_Official_KR/76040 22. https://cafe.naver.com/nas/453 23. https://hdacvalue.com/customer/notice/detail/11 24. http://www.zdnet.co.kr/view/?no=20181220093515 25. https://www.coinspeaker.com/top-10-initial-coin-offerings-icos-2017/ 26. https://twitter.com/etcdev/status/1069625401515872256?s=21 27. https://decenter.sedaily.com/NewsView/1S7DLGLP5L/GZ02 28. https://www.coindesk.com/consensys-confirms-layoffs-projecting-13-of-staff-at-startups-to-be-cut 29. http://news.hankyung.com/article/201812116086g 30. https://blockmanity.com/news/member-of-ethereum-classic-dev-team-etcdev-joins-tron-trx-binance-adds-trx-tusd-pair/  Code: Source: https://m.cafe.naver.com/nas/509

Author: Matthias9515
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: [Announcement] FINMA’s Investigation on Hdac ICO Has Finished  We have received the ‘No-Action Letter’ from FINMA, the Swiss Financial Market Supervisory Authority, on 22nd October. With this, the investigation on Hdac by FINMA has officially finished.  From having the full letter translated by a professional translator to having it reviewed by multiple legal agents as well as double-checking whether there would be any follow-up process needed, our top executives went through scrutiny taking a sufficient amount of time in the Swiss HQ. We could not leave any uncertainty regarding this, and therefore, it has taken some long time for us to share with you this great news.  The securement of the 'No-Action Letter,' which is the final step of FINMA's investigation upon an ICO project, means that there were no legal issues during the past ICO process and that Hdac Technolgy can officially operate global business activities as a cryptocurrency/blockchain company. In other words, Hdac has been acknowledged as an official cryptocurrency/blockchain company within the institutional boundary set by the Swiss regulatory authority.  At the same time, it means that we Hdac has gained an exceptional differentiate point in comparison to other coins. In addition, it will provide us with a huge driving force moving forward in regard to marketing, listing on exchanges, DApp partner development, blockchain ecosystem expansion as well as every our movements on diverse areas.  About a year has been passed since the TGE of Hdac late last year. We would like to express our sincere gratitude for your patience despite such a long wait.  [FINMA Letter Excerpt] We would like to share you with the core parts of the letter for your information:

Author: Jcga
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Voted few days ago.   "The Result of The Vote and The Implementation Date of Hdac Block Reward Reduction Oct 15, 2018  The Result of The Vote and The Implementation Date of Hdac Block Reward Reduction  1. The Result of The Second Vote on Hdac Block Reward Reduction  - Total Votes: 514 (100%) / 50% Reduction: 498 (96.89%) / 25% Reduction: 16 (3.11%)  - As per the vote result, the Hdac block reward reduction rate has been determined as 50%.  2. Application of The Hdac Block Reward Reduction  Hdac block reward reduction will be applied from block number 150,000. Application of the reduction is anticipated to be completed between 10:00 am and 11:00 pm (GMT + 9) on October 18, 2018.  -   Distribution of Source Code Update  The source code update for Hdac block reward reduction was released today (October 15, 2018).  (GitHub : https://github.com/Hdactech/hdac)  3. Revision of Hdac White Paper  Please be advised that the Hdac White Paper will be modified according to the decision of Hdac block reward reduction. The modified white paper will be reflected after the application of the Hdac source code update."  Source : https://www.hdactech.com/en/News/news.do?mode=view&articleNo=4080

Author: alexvilis
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: [Notice] Hdac Algorithm Change for Countermeasure of ASIC Machine https://www.hdactech.com/en/News/news.do?mode=view&articleNo=6951   We would like to announce that we will change the Hdac algorithm from Lyra2Rev2 to Skunk to prevent disturbance of the Hdac mining ecosystem due to Lyra2Rev2 ASIC machine.  The change will be applied from block number 151,880, and it will be applied on (GMT + 9) October 22, 2018.  Software with the new algorithm (version 1.08.0) must be applied to the entire full node running Hdac.  (※If you do not apply the update, Hdac mined after block number 151,880 will not be able to trade on the MainNet)

Author: Matthias9515
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Hdac Blockchain Technology Assessment Idea Challenge  Target:  Anyone interested in Hdac blockchain Period:  September 5, 2018 (Wed) ~ October 31, 2018 (Wed)  Process:  Review the source code of Hdac Core on Hdac Github(https://github.com/Hdactech/hdac) Analyze advantages, disadvantages, technical problems, potential improvement points of Hdac core technology Click the "New issue" button at the top right of https://github.com/Hdactech/hdac/issues Propose your opinion/ suggestion regarding Hdac blockchain core’s:  a) technical strengths and weaknesses, technical problems, and etc.; b) improvement plan based on evaluation and additional ideas*, etc.; c) other technical suggestions.  * Ideas that can maximize strong points and improve weaknesses. (Detailed idea/suggestions about source code error improvement plan, improvement of current function, new/additional function, and etc.)  For those who have made their proposals sufficiently, there will be a reward of Hdac—up to 50,000 Hdac according to both quality and quantity-wise assessment.  ※ Face-to-face meeting(s) can be requested if necessary. ※ Please fill in your Hdac wallet address to receive Hdac as submitting proposals.  https://hdactech.com/en/News/news.do?mode=view&articleNo=1022

The two companies will jointly develop and diversify real-estate businesses based on Hdac platform including blockchain-based smart co-working space project, blockchain-based smart home and smart city projects. Author: rgsnedds
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: if you want to mine HDAC using AMD GPU please see this how-to... it is using vertcoin devs release of lyclMiner and it's very power efficient, producing a good hashrate on your AMD cards. For Nvidia cards just use ccminer.  pool link below  Install lyclMiner on Ubuntu 16.04 to use AMD GPU.  Code: sudo apt update sudo apt upgrade git clone https://github.com/CryptoGraphics/lyclMiner.git sudo apt-get install libcurl4-openssl-dev libssl-dev libjansson-dev opencl-headers cd lyclMiner wget https://github.com/premake/premake-core/releases/download/v5.0.0-alpha12/premake-5.0.0-alpha12-linux.tar.gz tar -xvf premake-5.0.0-alpha12-linux.tar.gz ./premake5 gmake    cd build make cd .. rm -r premake-5.0.0-alpha12-linux.tar.gz mv kernels bin cd bin ./lyclMiner -g lyclMiner.conf nano lyclMiner.conf  # amend your pool info in the config file and ctrl X to save it#  screen -dmS DAC ./lyclMiner  POOL: http://dac.signal2noi.se

Author: Ruthenian
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: What do you mean - the mainnet has been launched already, how many projects out there are still struggling to release a mainnet years after their sales finished.  Also have you see this latest development:  Introducing the Harvit project!  Build on HDAC blockchain.  Harvit is a block-chain-based reward service for building a rational and effective interactive advertising ecosystem between advertisers and consumers. When a user watches an advertisement provided on the Habbit screen in front of a digital signage, participates in an event, a questionnaire, and scans a screen QR code, a reward coin for the advertisement is obtained as a reward for the advertisement.  https://www.hdacvalue.com/resources/data/editor/1806/5d23f890af05e7b861bd8cc442185a23_1529036554_7394.jpg  https://www.hdacvalue.com/resources/data/editor/1806/5d23f890af05e7b861bd8cc442185a23_1529036694_3409.png  And:  Hdac introduces the P2P financial platform, FINSPARK, and the ongoing P2P project!  Have you heard about the term P2P? A typical P2P definition is an abbreviation for peer to peer, which means interpersonal transactions.  Hdac is in the process of preparing to open the service. P2P is a service provided to integrated members in the Hdac value portal. It is a service that enables users to purchase goods and P2P funding in connected products page when they convert into integrated membership after membership.  https://www.hdacvalue.com/resources/data/editor/1806/1b9be0b2633de043818585621cc1bd72_1529048315_3089.png

Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Hdac smart factory PoC  Check out Hyundai BS&C and HYUNDAI-PAY's booths at Hdac Hackathon's event hall.  Among all of those contents, the IoT contract prototype for the smart factory is attracting everyone's attention!  For those who can't participate in the Hackathon, let's check out the clip. https://youtu.be/N0eEoEGEz-4  This is the PoC (Proof of concept) prototype of smart factory that introduces Hdac blockchain-based IoT contract. You might be curious about what is the advantage of driving all these devices through blockchain. The main concept of this prototype is that instead of a centralized control system, each unit of the process makes their own decision spontaneously to complete the whole process.  In other words, there is a smart contract in each step.  What we can see through this prototype is that units in every step make the decision locally and communicate with each other to reach agreements. That means we can make use of this concept to figure out and overcome the disadvantages of the centralized control system, which is also the main purpose of this prototype. Manufacturing units can be operated in an optimized way locally and all task indications can be offered by corresponding token value of Hdac, thus achieve the process optimization.  We believe this will bring you a whole new idea about the smart factory PoC, doesn’t it?

Author: rgsnedds
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: you maybe haven't been involved in crypto very long to understand the actual problem with the coin at the very base of it. The only 'private mining pool' would be a pool run by the developers or their marketing team, anything else would be a 'public mining pool' and utilised for the good of decentralisation.  basically, the marketing and development of this coin is all 'arse-about-tit' if they had wanted it to be centralised, they should have kept it closed-source, but no, the whining about 'private pools' and 'unofficial' miners is a total smoke-screen.  yes, HDAC have fuck-all to do with public mining of the coin, we get that, but that is far from the explanations that the community are asking for.  Basically, it's advertised as a IoT, when the base of the wallet and the blockchain are not IoT, they are (and I will admit - very good code) but based on bitcoin core and not really anything very new or technologically advanced.  Here's my take on it:  HDAC need a blockchain to power their products and the coin is just a by-product. IMHO The public mining of it should be supported, not shunned by the marketing team and the developers should embrace this community and encourage the growth of their blockchain in a decentralised manner.  regardless, the 'this is not an official stance' has become boring and tedious and as far as mining is concerned, i've moved on to other projects because of this.  good luck keeping that blockchain powered when all the public miners decide that they too are fed up of the bs.

Author: shewasfourteen
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Updates on Hdac Bounty distribution (June 20, 2018)  All Hdac wallet addresses which were sent even after the deadline (4th of June) were gathered until yesterday. Final confirmation for the distribution was also made. Currently, the list is being finalized and no more wallet addresses will be added to the list. The distribution process will be reviewed by the distribution team which will handle the enitre process. This may take some time. Once finished, we will announce the distribution date and distribution will take place in the alphabetical order of the BitcoinTalk username. We cannot guarantee that distribution will finish in just one day. Therefore, we will briefly keep you updated on where we are.  Please make sure that the Hdac wallet address you have sent is correct (you can check from your outbox in BitcoinTalk). Please also note that Amazix or the Hdac team are NOT responsible for any loss of DAC due to sending the wrong wallet address, or not sending the wallet address in time, and for unverified & mismatching BitcoinTalk usernames.  Apologies for the changes in schedule and the delay being caused. We are working hard to make sure the process to be completed smoothly without any errors. We appreciate for your kind patience and understanding.  The Hdac team.

Body: Hey rgsnedds  As you said, Hdac is an open source project, anyone can mine the DAC tokens. The message above was referring to the listing of DAC on exchanges. In that case, as it was clarified - Hdac didn't list their coin officially yet. Means that the company didn't ask BiBox/Bitonbay or any other exchange that did so until now, to list DAC there. When Hdac will be listed officially on an exchange - it will be announced.

Author: rgsnedds
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: But even then, listing on an exchange is at the discretion of the exchange. Therefore an 'official' exchange listing simply means "we've paid an exchange to have our coin on it"  If i were the developers, i'd be pretty pleased that an exchange wanted to carry the coin and stop the wishy-washy statements about 'not being officially invovled'  If the developers didn't want the coin to be open-source.. then why release it as an open source project. Clearly there is not a great experience in crypto here.I've been involved since 2009 and to be quite honest, eithere the developers, or the marketing team have make huge mistakes here.  The ICO was sensible at 14% and the investment was huge. Huge enough to afford a prime-time television advert. The initiative is great, the product looks fabulous and it looks like it could be a market leader.  here's my concern:  it's time the marketing team and the developers started looking after the miners of the blockchain and stop with the 'that's not official' statements, because at the end of the day, the blockchain does not exist without miners keeping it running.  And for christ sake... fix that diff retargeting, it's a shambles.

Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Official Announcement From Hdac  Since the MainNet launch we have received many inquiries and we hope to answer them with this announcement.   (1) Mining  ① Private Mining Pool It seems that some of the TGE participants were hacked by a private mining pool that impersonated Hdac. Please note that our mining pool is a decentralized network, so Hdac Technology has no legal liability.  ② Hdac Technology Self-Mining We have not operated any mining pools since the MainNet launch. This is in accordance with Swiss law and FINMA. Hdac Technology does not operate any mining pools and will not operate any mining pools in the future.  ③ Mining Equipment for Sale We have never been involved in manufacturing or selling any mining equipment and do not plan on it in the future.    (2) Transaction-related entry (P2P, Listing)  ① P2P Our platform is designed based on the universal standards of P2P transactions. We have also built the Hdac Platform in accordance with the Swiss regulation authorities in the case that utility tokens evolve into payment tokens. Therefore, we do not intervene with any personal transactions and those kind of transactions are irrelevant to Hdac Technology.  ② Listing We do not review the DAC listings under the management of our company and we are not involved in listing by third parties. Trading and transaction fees from large-scale or multilateral exchanges have no relation to Hdac Technology.       (3) Betanet Testing  We have received a lot of positive feedback from users who mined on the Betanet. As we stated in the past, mined tokens on Betanet may not be used for actual use and we have decided to burn them.  - burnaddress: HJXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXVarS5i - With the cooperation from Betanet participants, the DAC that was mined from Betanet testing will be collected and burned. - In order to retrieve the remaining DAC, we will take any necessary measures. - We awarded Betanet test participants with DAC for electricity and equipment costs. - We will soon notify you on our progress.   (4) Founder’s Reward  The Founder’s Reward has been processed in accordance with local laws in Switzerland, including the review of the Swiss Legal Advisor and the approval of the Hdac Technology AG Board of Directors. In the cryptocurrency system, it is a trend to reward 10-20% (5-year spread at 8% for Hdac) to the early team members of the cryptocurrency.    However, Hdac Technology AG has decided not to give out the Founder’s Reward. (burnaddress: HJXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXVarS5i) For the past two years, our researchers and developers have worked extremely hard to create a competitive blockchain platform. We will continue to strive to develop the best blockchain solutions. In addition, we are in the process of being assessed under the FINMA guidelines. It is an extremely rigorous process and we are very proud to have come this far. The liquidity of DAC will lead to active mining which will then lead to a platform-based ecosystem. All of this will enrich the value of Hdac.   (5) Official Communication Channel  We noticed that users discussed Hdac on unofficial communities before the MainNet launch. With that, we have agreed that it is imperative for us to discuss and communicate with users about the roadmap and evolution of Hdac Technology.    (6) Wallet Information and Security Authentication  Hdac does not keep any personal information on file. DAC can be lost from leaking personal information. Please be sure to read the following points carefully to avoid any financial losses or risk being hacked.  A. Store your wordlist in a safe place. If your wordlist is exposed, you risk disclosing your account information.  (1) Make sure you are the only person who knows your wordlist. (2) Don’t save your wordlist on your computer or smartphone. (3) Do not take a picture of your wordlist. (4) Keep your wordlist in a safe place where there is no Internet access.  B. PIN management is important. C. Download an antivirus software on your computer and smartphone to protect yourself against hackers.    (7) Additional AMLA Procedure for TGE Participants  As have announced several times, we are still waiting for TGE participants to complete the additional AMLA procedure. We need all TGE participants to turn in the documents so we may be able to continue the AMLA(KYC) confirmation procedures. Currently, only 59% of participants have completed the process. We will continue to contact the participants who have yet to complete the process. In a short amount of time, we have done rigorous testing in preparation for the MainNet launch, to provide a complete and stable network for users. We will continue to research and develop more solutions. We have been striving to enhance the value of Hdac and establishing credibility by joining an SRO and receiving FINMA and VQF certifications. Hdac has taken its first step in this industry with the MainNet launch. As a growing eco-partner, Hdac will continue to work towards becoming an IoT-based blockchain platform that may apply to various industries. Finally, Hdac Technology AG will ensure quality assurance as we continue to work on the solutions from the Hdac Platform roadmap. We are very grateful to the supporters who have been with us from the beginning. We will continue to work hard and develop a blockchain solution that will be available for diverse industries.    Thank you, Hdac Technology AG

Body: Of course, first post here and especially first post in bounty thread should be updated with new announcements like wallet change, etc. There are many members they don't read the latest post or follow this threads at all. Author: wwzsocki
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: This is nothing new that bounties are paid long after ICO. All 4 of my last campaigns were paid with few months delay or even in monthly rates during next 18 months. Almost all bounty campaigns rule number one is that they can change the payout date, stake or even not pay at all with no explanation provided. It's a huge gamble and that is why you should choose your bounty wisely.  I'm still very confident with Hdac. They have a long roadmap so for me from start this was a long time investment. I think the price will go up only with a working product. Communication after ICO with the Team was good and we see updates keep coming.  Even if they pay you tomorrow, there is no place to sell Hdac coin. Luckily from this delayed for months bounties I learned how to be calm and wait with patience. Soon you will learn too.

Author: Saichoukyushin
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Edited  What happened, how sad it happens and knowingly cointelegraph is a reliable source of news but i will ask it on their telegram to confirm if it was real. The report i guess will not be taken without having a strong evidence.  This is what i read from their chats.  Eugene(Eunkyu) Lim: This guy nicknamed 'Ethereum V' created his personal pool called 'Hdac pool', which people wrongly presumed was an official pool created by Hdac Tech. After abusing others' hashpower, Ethereum V reported without providing any proof that the mined DACs were 'hacked', and simultaneously, Ethereum V disappeared to nowhere (his Kakao talk group and profile were deleted).  Hdac Tech had nothing to do with 'Hdac pool', and Hdac blockchain has experienced neither problems nor hacks.  Please watch out for false rumors and fake news. Thank you.

Author: gamehendge02
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Thank you for your continued support and interest in Hdac.   In regards to the recent rumors about Hdac, we would like to update you on our current status. Please note that only the information on the Hdac homepage is credible and legal actions may be taken against any defamation statements.   We submitted the required documentation to the Swiss FINMA (Financial Market Supervisory Authority) in March 2018 and it is currently under review. The two main points of review are a categorization of Hdac token (DAC) and the potential development of Hdac technologies.   In February 2018, FINMA tightened the requirements for the confirmation procedures of KYC and AMLA. Therefore, we will be joining an SRO (self-regulatory organization) and send out emails for the additional confirmation procedures of KYC and AMLA. We ask that all TGE participants respond promptly to the emails that will be sent out this week by AMLA@hdactech.com.   We would also like to inform you that we have added sufficient nodes to provide a global service and have verified the security of mainnet. Again, we would like to thank everyone for your patience and we will shortly announce the opening of our mainnet.   We will strive to establish Hdac as a successful blockchain platform.  Thank you.

Author: wwzsocki
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: I see that many of you think that we will see better price even 5 times as ICO. I am not so sure. You know why?  Because of the difference between pre-sale token prices and main token sale prices. Not only but this will be the main reason, there is also huge inflation rate and IOTA competition.  In other words; when the pre-sale token price is much cheaper than the main token sale, token prices usually fall after the ICO. We all know that presale bonus was 1000% and BTC price changed from 1000$ at the start of ICO to 11.000$ in the end. If you participated in the ICO, you paid around 15x the USD price paid by initial investors.  This will play out in one of two ways:  1. Token Prices Begin At $0.50/DAC On Exchanges  Pre-sale investors will see the ridiculously good returns they’ve achieved and immediately cash out. Token prices will then crash to well below the main ICO price  2. Token Prices Begin Well Below $0.50/DAC On Exchanges  Result: Token sale investors have already lost out. On top of this, the team has confirmed (via Telegram) that there is no lockup period for any of the early investors so there will be nothing in place to stop this from occurring either.  source http://cryptogurus.com/reviews/hdac-review/

Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Latest Updates from Hdac ¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯  Thank you for your continued support and interest in Hdac.   In regards to the recent rumors about Hdac, we would like to update you with our current status. Please note that only the information on the Hdac homepage is credible and legal actions may be taken against any defamation statements.   We submitted the required documentation to the Swiss FINMA (Financial Market Supervisory Authority) in March 2018 and it is currently under review. The two main points of review are categorization of Hdac token (DAC) and the potential development of Hdac technologies.   In February 2018, FINMA tightened the requirements for the confirmation procedures of KYC and AMLA. Therefore, we will be joining a SRO (self-regulatory organization) and sending out emails for the additional confirmation procedures of KYC and AMLA. We ask that all TGE participants respond promptly to the emails that will be sent out this week by AMLA@hdactech.com.   We would also like to inform you that we have added sufficient nodes to provide a global service and have verified the security of mainnet. Again, we would like to thank everyone for your patience and we will shortly announce the opening of our mainnet.   We will strive to establish Hdac as a successful blockchain platform.  Thank you. ******** Please notice that the hdac.io website is down - was created for the TGE. There's a new website for Hdac - http://www.hdactech.com/en/index.do You can also login into your account on this website.

Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Quick reminder for why HDAC might not be as actively communication as some would like atm.  Hdac has submitted all required administrative documents in accordance with the Swiss Currency Market Guidelines of the Swiss Financial Market Supervisory Authority(FINMA) and adhering to the Swiss government's recommendations. Hdac will be shown to the public in compliance with all legal and administrative procedures, so please do not be concerned about rumours. We apologize for the delay in the schedule as we need to follow the changes made in the government’s policy and guideline. We reaffirm that we are doing our best to provide prompt processing and accurate announcement.  Thank you again for your patience and understanding.  The Hdac Team

Author: Thenik87
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Interesting news from Hdac:  Announcement on registration of Hdac distribution for presale participants and current status on Hdac project.   Dear Hdac participants, Thank you for your support for Hdac presale and TGE. This is to notify on Hdac distribution for presale participants and current status on Hdac project.   1. Registration of Hdac distribution procedure/schedule for presale participants  Hdac distribution for presale participants will start on March 27th at 9:00 AM(GMT/UTC+1). If you are a Hdac presale participant, you should sign in the website below and apply for the Hdac distribution. Presale distribution will be proceeded for the next four weeks, so please register on the website within the schedule.   Distribution period: March 27th, 9:00 am - April 20th, 9:00 am (about four weeks)  The website URL for Hdac presale distribution will be announced on the relevant date.   2. Current status on Hdac project  Hdac has submitted all required administrative documents in accordance with the Swiss Currency Market Guidelines of the Swiss Financial Market Supervisory Authority(FINMA) and adhering to the Swiss government's recommendations. Hdac will be shown to the public in compliance with all legal and administrative procedures, so please do not be concerned about rumors.  We apologize for the delay in the schedule as we need to follow the changes made in the government’s policy and guideline. We reaffirm that we are doing our best to provide prompt processing and accurate announcement.  Thank you again for your patience and understanding.  The Hdac Team.

Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: ■ Notification on distribution & refund for TGE participants and the current status on Hdac project ■   Dear TGE participants,  Currently, DAC distribution and refunds for TGE participants are almost completed. Approximately, 99% of distribution and 90% of refund have been proceeded. The deadline for refund is March 15 (GMT/UTC+1) and DAC distribution is March 19 (GMT/UTC+1). Participants for DAC distribution MUST create & register Hdac wallet by the deadline. (Otherwise, participation may be canceled and refunded.)  In addition, DAC distribution for Hdac presale participants will soon begin, and it will be a separately announced. Thank you for your understanding in advance and we will do our best to complete the process successfully.  We are already aware of reselling DAC by some of the Hdac presale participants and therefore the transfer function in the Hdac voucher has been blocked to prevent reselling. Hdac team is NOT responsible for any damages caused by reselling between individuals.  Hdac is in compliance with international regulations and guidelines. We will do everything to protect the participants. Thank you.  Hdac team

Author: Ruthenian
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: The mining won't go live until later in the year and uses ePoW and the Lyra2Rev2 ASIC-resistant algorithm. The Hdac ePoW consensus algorithm will support a variety of technical methods for creating a healthy mining environment. A separate hardware security module [HSM] is being developed to enhance security of the mining node where this will be an available option to select. that is all the information we have at this time.  You can find more info here->https://github.com/Hdactech/Hdac/wiki/Hdac-Technical-Whitepaper#dac-generating-mining-and-the-mining-resul

Quote from: silvestar on January 31, 2018, 08:47:38 AM If a coin or token has a potential, and if it is a solid team and community, it is increasing the price regularly in any way. It falls 5%, 6% rises; 12% falls, 17% rises, when you look at and at the end of 1 year, the ico price has doubled 5 times. For me, HDAC is a coin with extraordinary potential. The first of these is the name, although it is not directly related to the actual Hyundai. Secondly, they will write their own block chain and iot technology. I think that the team will stick to the roadmap until the end because the Koreans are often multi-disciplinary people.  Though, they seem to be trying to come to ico prices, at least in 1-2 months because they sell about $ 220 million in coins in pre-sale.  Hey silvestar. Thank you very much for the support!

Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Special announcement from Hdac - DAC distribution ¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯  Dear Hdac TGE participant, Hdac(DAC) distribution has started from 9:00 am, January 25th, 2018 (GMT/UTC+1). During the distribution process, TGE participants will receive actual ‘Hdac(DAC)’ which will be used in the future. Please be sure to complete the Hdac distribution procedure until February 28th, 2018.  All participants MUST install the Hdac wallet to receive Hdac(DAC). Hdac wallet is available on Android mobile (APK files), Windows PC, and OS X (Mac) PC app.  Please follow the instruction below. 1. Sign in and go to ‘My Hdac wallet’ menu at https://hdac.io 2. Install the Hdac wallet app and ‘Copy’ the Hdac wallet address. 3. ‘Paste’ your Hdac wallet address in ‘My Hdac wallet’ menu at https://hdac.io 4. Please click the ‘Check validity’ button. 5. Enter the ‘OTP code’. (*Required) 6. Receive Hdac(DAC). (Completed in 2~3 business days)  Please refer to https://hdac.io for detailed instructions for wallet installation.  Thank you.  The Hdac team  ● ‘TGE participation order’ is based on the actual date of the first participation since November 27, 2017. ● Those who are refunded are excluded from the above. ● Hdac(DAC) distribution may take 2~3 business days. ● The exchange guide for the presale participants will be announced separately.

Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Announcement on Hdac TGE results and refund instructions  The KYC process has closed since January 15, 2018. Therefore, all TGE procedures are closed.  We have received all data from Intrum (IDnow), our KYC company, on January 16. We therefore notify that each participant’s private information have been safely stored under full responsibility of Hdac’s person in charge of privacy protection.  Total of 2,057 participants from worldwide have participated and out of them, 1,627 participants were successful in KYC authentication. We thank all participants and deeply express our apologies for any inconveniences caused for KYC procedures.  We will send a separate notification email to those (did not proceed KYC, failed KYC, transferred less than 0.1 BTC, participated outside period etc.) who are relevant for a refund which resulted in approximately 430 participants.  Currently, we are double-checking with participation details for unsuccessful KYC and unqualified participation. We therefore request for your kind understanding as it may take some time to check each participation to prevent any errors.  Please note that we will soon update the date and detailed instructions for refund. We are expecting to proceed from next week and therefore, we strongly recommend to double-check the refund wallet address which was inserted by each participant.  The transaction fee for refunds will all be on Hdac and therefore you will receive the exact BTC amount as participated. (However, the transaction fee for participating is excluded.)

Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Hdac Notice on KYC countries Dear Hdac participant, We have announced previously that 10 countries (Israel, Vietnam, UAE, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Philippines, Cocos Island, Australia, Taiwan, and India) would be added by January 9, 2018. However, only 3 countries; Australia, Taiwan, and India were added where the remaining 7 countries could not be added. We sincerely apologize for the confusion and letting down many participants regarding unlisted countries. There was a misunderstanding while communicating between the person in charge and the team in Switzerland, where we made an announcement which was unconfirmed. Disciplinary measures were taken for the person responsible for this matter. We once again deeply apologize for the issue and full refund, including transaction fees, will be made. We promise that we will be more careful at everything and to keep up with the warm support we have received. Thank you. The Hdac Team

Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Announcement on KYC schedule and available countries.  KYC will be closed on January 15, 2018 at 22:00 (GMT/UTC+1) as announced before. Please proceed before the deadline since KYC will not be operational afterwards. Australia, Taiwan, and India will be added on the KYC list from January 9, 2018. The Hdac team tried everything to list other countries as well, but it was impossible to meet the deadline. We deeply express our apologies to many participants who were unable to participate in the Hdac TGE due to KYC. Therefore, we would proceed with full refund for those who could not participate due to their countries not being listed.  Hdac is planning to proceed with refund by January for those who could not complete KYC, could not proceed due to countries not listed, and transferred less than 0.1 BTC (the minimum amount).  Hdac will cover all transaction fees for refunds as trust and protecting rights of participants comes first.  We will make an official announcement on the refund procedure separately.  [Announcement on the long waiting time for KYC]  Currently, there is a long waiting time of 45~60 minutes when proceeding with step 4 (identification) of the KYC. There seems to be a delay and congestion due to numerous attempts by many participants. Hdac team is continuously communicating with IDnow (KYC company) and requesting development of the procedure.  Therefore, depending on the situation, it may take an hour due to long delays. Hanging up while waiting would result in “aborted” and you will need to proceed KYC certification again.  Again, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused, and please complete the KYC certification within the deadline.  Thank you.  The Hdac Team  ※ All TGE participants must complete the KYC certification to complete the TGE participation. ※ If the KYC status is displayed ‘aborted’ in ‘My info’, please try KYC process again.     (If KYC certification is successfully completed, KYC status should be displayed ‘Success’.)

The Hdac team will make an official announcement on next week, regard KYC certification available country list and due date.  We will also inform the KYC available date for Australia, Taiwan and India.  Please complete the KYC certification within the period.  Thank you.   The Hdac Team   ※ All participants must complete the KYC certification to complete the TGE participation.  ※ If the KYC status is displayed ‘aborted’ in ‘My info’, please try KYC process again.      (If KYC certification is successfully completed, KYC status should be displayed ‘Success’.) ※ KYC closed date (GMT/UTC+1) :      Sunday, Dec 31, 2017      Monday, Jan 01, 2018      Tuesday, Jan 02, 2018    Quote from: item-ax on December 29, 2017, 10:27:49 AM why peoples wants a refund ? whats the drama There ? can someone enlight me please ? Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Hey there Problems of Hdac. I understand your concerns. I'm sorry but I can't elaborate on your blocking from the Hdac channel since I'm not sure what happened. Regarding the KYC process, you need to understand except your case, there are others that do wish to participate and contribute to this project. For them, this is critical to have an extension to the process that increases their chances to pass it successfully (due to some technical issues). Because of the extension of the KYC process, Hdac team can't inquire the refund requests of the participants until the KYC process is complete. The team is aware of the fact that participants willing to be refunded and they want to use their money for other purposes. Hdac announced that the refund process will not be delayed after January 2018. In addition, According to the TGE terms, There are no refunds. That is exactly why the team has to inquire any refund request, and as I wrote above the team can conduct this process only after the KYC will be over. I'm sorry for your experience, I hope my answer addressed your concerns properly. And of course, I hope you will receive your money back soon.

Author: Thenik87
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Hi everyone! I would like to both congratulate and thank you for the support during this TGE.  I've copied the Thank You message from the Hdac team below. It's a bit long, but worth the read.   Hdac has successfully completed its TGE on December 22nd. We would like to express our sincere gratitude to all contributors in the world.  Both the presale and the TGE have successfully finished with a total fund of $ 258 million (About 15,200 BTC). Compared to the TGE (ICO) of all other cryptocurrencies, Hdac TGE has raised a staggering fund ranking the third highest in the world. Receiving such outstanding support from the global community, the Hdac team will be even more committed to accomplish milestones with integrity and responsibility.  During the TGE, the value of global cryptocurrencies skyrocketed, placing considerable difficulty on the TGE. Many investors reckoned direct trading superior to participating in the TGE, resulting in a downsize of the global TGE market as a whole. Nevertheless, considering that promising cryptocurrency platforms that raised $10-30 million were regarded as successful, we are confident in announcing that Hdac TGE has been successful, which raised a tremendous fund of $20 million.  In fact, the primary goal of Hdac TGE was to promote our blockchain-based IoT platform around the world and establish a touchstone for future IoT infrastructure rather than to secure funds. But, we sincerely apologize to the all TGE participants that during the Hdac TGE, since we have more focused on technical part, pre-marketing and TGE guidance has not been smoothly progressed.  Anyway, we take pride in our presales that sold out to the last token, and we have recently premiered to the global stage by proceeding with the last procedure, TGE, in accordance with international law norms.  From March 2017, the Hdac team has held technical seminars and attended road shows all around the world: Korea, Japan, China, and Thailand in spring and summer; London and Zurich in July; Johannesburg in September; Dubai and Gibraltar in October; and finally Paris, Slovenia, Romania, and KINTEX Seoul in November and December.  Hdac has developed a blockchain-based IoT platform specialized for the IoT environment, a feat which garnered a lot of attention and interest from both the cryptocurrency community and the IT industry. We have also worked with excellent advisors such as Mike Costache (Co-founder & managing partner at KrowdMentor), Eddy Travia (CEO & co-founder of Coinsilium), and Stuart Corby (founder of Authentag and Origin Tracker) to make Hdac known to the world and produce breakthroughs.  The Hdac team has also endeavored to interact with contributors and cryptocurrency communities by the means of various SNS channels: Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Telegram, and Medium. For a month, we received more than 10,000 likes and about 5 million impressions in Facebook, and more than 3.5 million views, 25,000 visitors, and 3,000 followers in Twitter. In addition, more than 10,000 members are currently in the official Hdac messenger chat groups. We are sincerely grateful of people all over the world for their unyielding support of Hdac.  Below are the summary of Hdac crowdsales: - Presale (1st~ 3rd / March~ July, 2017): $238 million (About 14,000 BTC/ Dec.21 Current value) - TGE (November 27 ~ December 22, 2017): $20 million (About 1,200 BTC) · More detailed information on TGE contribution will be made on January 15, 2018  After the TGE participants finish their KYC formalities, Hdac will receive evaluation from multiple exchanges. With the termination of the TGE, the Hdac team will focus on listing and main-net development, so that Hdac can be traded conveniently in Korean and overseas exchanges starting from February or March 2018 (in the first-half of 2018, at the latest).  We also aim to globalize Hdac so that it stands out in the blockchain industry. Hdac will finally realize a practical IoT platform in the near future, not only as a means of transaction, but also as a modality which people can easily access in everyday life. With this goal in mind, the Hdac team will do its best to form partnerships and alliances with related companies.  The upcoming year of 2018 will be a year in which Hdac will leap forward. We would like you to stay tuned to Hdac which will actualize practical application and utilization. We are always grateful for your support of Hdac.  Thank you  The Hdac team

Author: Jcga
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: HDAC ICO Overview - Decentralized IoT and M2M Transactions on the Blockchain  CryptoCoinShow =>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kNJKy3JgPcM HDAC Site: https://hdac.io HDAC Chat: https://t.me/Hdac_TGE  "Hdac project, a platform for Internet of Things contracts and Machine to Machine transactions based on hdac hybrid blockchain technology and backed by Hyundai BS&C. Their next generation platform is the world’s first IoT contract and payment protocol where devices are authenticatied, mapped and verified through the blockchain and can talk to each other and make or clear payments autonomously. Soon Everything that can be connected by adding internet access will expand the internet of things drastically to almost every device you can think of in the near future.  So Hdac runs on its own hybrid blockchain. This means that it can go from public, to private, back to public again. The hidden and private network has “safe tunnelling” between a user and their devices to combat hacks, privacy invasion and external attacks. Mutual authentication between devices is crucial to maintain a reliable private blockchain.. which to be practical in the real world needs to also interact with the public blockchain. The permissioned nature of the private blockchain means it cannot be accessed by nodes as freely as a public, however Hdac has created a Bridge Node which acts as an intermediary containing key configuration information to link the two.  Hdac’s blockchain does not use proof of work or proof of stake, but a new method called ePoW, or e proof of work, which eliminates the power inefficiencies and mining monopolies occurring in Bitcoin right now. Through a block window concept they can overcome common limitations in a more fair, distributed and decentralized network with the same level of security."

In the past couple of years, the FinTech ecosystem embraced Bitcoin and other digital currencies, a movement which allowed multiple disruptive industries to explode. The race toward a unifying theme (decentralization) became evident and part of our everyday lives."  Source : http://d10e.biz/  for instance, CR7 standing for... ?

Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Quote from: Adriano2010 on December 19, 2017, 03:24:26 AM Will this start mining? And if yes what is need to mine it, CPU, GPU, ASIC or another special hardware? And on what exchange will be first listed?  Hey Raxx208 and Adriano2010.  Right now what we know is that Hdac is equipped with ePoW and, separately, the Lyra2Rev2 ASIC-resistant algorithm is applied.As of right now, the details in the white paper is what we have. But the closer we come close to release of mining, that is when the details for mining will be released.  Quote from: tiger2monkey on December 19, 2017, 04:54:57 AM Is it really associated with big name Hyundai, the car manufacturer? or the project just misused the name?  Hey there Tiger2monkey.  Hdac is created by Hyundai BS&C, not Hyundai Motors. There is, however, a familiar connection - the founder of Hdac is the nephew of both the former and present CEO of Hyundai Motors.

Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Hey there Bigcash2011.  Regarding the presales, Here is Hdac official announcement:  Official release of the Hdac Presale information.  We understand that there were certain issues regarding questions about the presale information and we thank you for your patience. We have had long discussions regarding this matter and came up with some conclusions:  We will disclose only the total amount and the exchange (discount) rates for the rounds during the presale. (Specific details, for example amount per round etc. will be fully disclosed after the TGE with the amount raised through the TGE).  Total amount raised during the presale is about 14,000 BTC  A brief background on the presale: The Hdac Digital Transformation Community (DTC) officially began on March, 2017. Unlike other Alt coins, which partly improves the functions, we started off the development by targeting the Mainnet in the IoT area. Currently, the key functions of the IoT Contract, Payment, ePoW etc. are being developed in the corresponding order.  From April 2017, in order to meet the value of the technical implementation for Hdac, we began our first and a limited presale at a rate, 1 BTC : 35,000 DAC. Afterwards, we proceeded by correspondingly modifying the exchange rate as the following: in May, 1 BTC : 32,000 DAC and in July, 1 BTC : 28,000 DAC. Changes in the exchange rate with time, has been adopted due to the increase in the level of technical implementation for Hdac.  Currently, we are in a position where we can provide the Mainnet Hdac token since the Hdac token development is completed. Regarding this value, we decided to come up with the rate, 1 BTC : 18,000 DAC. Unlike what the presale participants have received as an exchange proof of Hdac, TGE participants will receive the officially released Hdac Token. Also, since the TGE was postponed due to KYC & AML issues, we are planning an event (TBA on November 27) for the participants where they will receive an extra 4,000 DAC per 1 BTC (meaning, if you buy for 1 BTC, you will receive 22,000 DAC in total: 18,000 + 4,000, that is, 25% bonus). There is also a Lucky Draw Event which is currently ongoing (11/10 ~ 11/24).  It has been 8 months after the presale and the crypto world has rapidly changed which had many external effects. However, Hdac is continuously developing and working to not only function as a currency which is simply traded on the exchange, but also to become the world’s best IoT Contract & Payment Blockchain.  Thank you.  The Hdac Team   The target amount for the TGE is 6,000 BTC. Hdac will announce once the goal is reached.   Quote from: xxxzero on December 15, 2017, 12:23:02 PM An interesting platform and a large team are the key to great success. But no one knows the future and how it will be, but today you can participate accurately in such projects.  Hi xxxzero. Thank you for your support.  Quote from: Tomohisa on December 15, 2017, 12:35:38 PM When will we know more in detail about 'contracts by Hyundai'?  Hey Tomohisa.  Can you elaborate more on your question? What exactly are the contracts by Hyundai?

Author: dhendrickk
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: HDAC is a Swiss foundation and not Korean. Founders and developers behind are Korean but not the company doing the ICO, meaning it’s not affected by Korean regulations.  **It’s also important to understand that there has been no official ban on ICOs in South Korea from any government agency. There have however been discussions about potential regulations in the future for ICOs being launched by South Korean companies. These potential regulations may come in effect, next year and HDAC foundation welcome such regulations, so that investors may be protected from seriousness projects being launched.  The Korean government wants to more tightly regulate exchanges and crypto trading, but this will not hinder Hdac TGE and Hdac’s further development.

Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Hey guys. I'm adding here an important announcement from the Hdac team regarding the KYC process.  Dear Hdac follower,  We are terribly sorry for all the inconvenience caused regarding the KYC procedure.  We were recommended by PST, our lawfirm, that Germany's KYC company, Intrum (www.intrum.ch), is suitable for KYC and therefore we are proceeding KYC with Intrum.  Regarding all the current problems caused during the KYC process, the Hdac team and Intrum are cooperating to solve the problems. We will do everything to solve the problem as soon as possible.  For now, below are some notices on the KYC policy: 1. We have already announced about the KYC period which is due December 22. However, we will be extending the KYC period so that everyone who have invested can complete their KYC process successfully. 2. The KYC procedure operates for 200 people per day (average 10 people per hour).  Also, we have noticed that most of Asian countries are not on the list when proceeding with KYC. We are currently discussing regarding this matter and will make an announcement once we come up with a conclusion.  Once again, we apologize for the inconvenience caused during the KYC. We hope for your deep understanding and patience.  Thank you.  The Hdac Team.  *For further issues or inquiries about KYC, please contact us on: support@hdac.io with your Name/email/Ident ID/the problem.

Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Hey sudhakark. (7%)840 million coins upon release; (7%)840 million for infrastructure, eco-system and liquidity. The rest of the tokens will be mined during the next 170 years. The total token amount of the Hdac blockchain is 12 billion DAC. The first block reward begins with 5,000DAC before token halving. The block generation cycle is 3 minutes, and halving is set to reduce the reward by half for every 840,000 blocks. That is, the block reward is reduced by half approximately every 58 months since the Genesis block was created. The tokens generated by the first block reward are 2,640,000,000 DAC, and 12% of the tokens will be used for creating infrastructure, and an ecosystem to implement Hdac technology, boost its transaction, and also for liquidity management.It maintains the associated value of the DAC by reducing its supply. It also creates a strong incentive to setup and run HDAC nodes.  Which means that the rest of the tokens that will be mined distributed among the system and the miners.

Body: With Hdac or DAC (Hdac * T), you would be in control of transactions made. This would also help you to understand as to how can you face the biggest challenge now and it is none other than privacy. It is also one of the many reasons for Hdac to come up with Hybrid Blockchain Networks as, this fights the privacy that IoT or the Internet of Thing faces most of the times.   There is however, one of the many questions that seem to be unanswered and it is as to how will Hybrid Blockchain Network work? Besides there is another doubt that arises in the mind after going through the website and it is as to how or what are the things that sets Hdac apart from the crowd?

Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Hey Sudhakark.  Thank you for your interest.  The hybrid blockchain should evolve from the private blockchain by the possibility of using Hardware wallet.I guess the hybrid blockchain depends on two factors: 1. Hdac Private Blockchain 2. Hdac's hardware wallet.Only after Hdac will finish their development we could see the hybrid blockchain comes to life. Until then we shall wait for further details regarding this.      Hdac Private Blockchain [HdacT], a blockchain based smart transaction method on the Hdac platform, is designed to perform a given task under the various commanding conditions in the IoT environment. HdacT provides these M2M transaction functions and a simple transaction service environment, and with the rationality and efficiency that the Hdac platform pursues, it will be the platform of choice for use and control with IoT devices. In addition, Hdac will evolve into a hybrid blockchain platform by providing a hardware wallet for user security and transaction convenience in service of the aforementioned communication and transactions between IoT devices.

Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Hey StartisKing.  Hdac Website Bounty thread (on Bitcointalk) Feel free to read Hdac White paper as well.  By the way, Hdac TGE is live, more details about it can be found on their website.   And regarding the Korean regulations - HDAC is a swiss foundation and not Korean. Founders and developers behind are Korean but not the company doing the ICO, meaning it’s not affected by Korean regulations. It’s also important to understand that there has been no official ban on ICOs in South Korea from any government agency. There has however been discussions about potential regulations in the future for ICOs being launched by  South Korean companies. These potential regulations may come into effect next year and HDAC foundation welcomes such regulations, so that investors may be protected from unserious projects being launched.

Body: Hdac shows us how we can connect IoT aka the internet of things to have a make - over of sorts in the way our devices work. This list is kind of never ending because there are other devices such as fitness trackers and all those VR head sets in this list. Author: mme1022
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: Hey Sudhakark.  Hdac is wishing the establish the M2M concept with using IoT (Internet of Things) contracts. According to their white paper, IoT contract is a 'Machine to Machine' (M2M) service that controls all the devices. It is a concept expanded from the object of 'Smart Contract' to the 'IoT Device,' where the programmer, when creating a Smart Contract, shares the address of the device which will be controlled on the blockchain network through Hdac. IoT Contract is a concept where the object of the Smart Contract is expanded to IoT device.The programmer creates a program controlling the operation of the IoT device, and this is the IoT Smart Contract. It can send the IoT contract to certain devices to operate machine based automated process and payment. IoT contract is a transaction that transfers control commands between user-device or device-device. The IoT Contract lay the foundations for the M2M service that enables devices to communicate on their own (‘Beyond the Human Pay’).  I think you should read Hdac white paper.

Author: hackg
Title: [ANN][SALE] Hdac - Blockchain-based IoT contracts by Hyundai. 27th November
Body: WARNING: This doesn't really help build investor confidence...  http://m.koreaherald.com/view.php?ud=20160825000368#cb  Hyundai BS&C, a construction firm associated with Hyundai Group, has been outed for frequently shortchanging subcontractors. Records from the Fair Trade Commission showed that Hyundai BS&C was caught violating related laws exceeding the set limit between 2013 and 2015.  Hyundai BS&C was established by Chung Dae-sun, one of the grandsons of Hyundai Group founder Chung Ju-young and husband of former celebrity anchor Noh Hyun-jung. The junior Chung was previously CEO of the firm and holds the entire controlling stake in Hyundai BS&C, which is focused on building homes and mixed-use apartment buildings in urban areas.  Related laws were revised in 2010 to allow the FTC to release the names of frequent violators.
